testimonials.name: Classmate from GCT
testimonials.content: Abdul Rasheed helped me debug my C++ project when I was stuck for hours. He has a great way of explaining complex concepts in simple terms.

testimonials.name: Junior Student
testimonials.content: Whenever I face issues with HTML or CSS, Abdul is my go-to person. He not only solves the problem but teaches me how to avoid it next time.

testimonials.name: Project Partner
testimonials.content: Working with Abdul on the GCT Bhakkar website was amazing. His attention to detail and problem-solving skills made our project stand out.
